citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm-12:45pm
on 01AUG2023.
The inspector arrived at the facility and called contact phone numbers in the database. An individual later arrived at the
facility gate and stated the licensee was not on the premises. The Inspector waited outside the facility gate for 30 minutes
then left the premises.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm-12:45pm 
on 01AUG2023. 
 
The inspector arrived at the facility and called contact phone numbers in the database. An individual later arrived at the 
facility gate and stated the licensee was not on the premises. The Inspector waited outside the facility gate for 30 minutes 
then left the premises. 
 
 
End Section
